1453284296442134528.text:
🥳While @code doesn't (yet) support draft (aka version) 2020-12 of JSON Schema, they WILL soon support unicode in the regular expressions!

🙋Issue raised: https://t.co/fBu9XXOY6r
🔀PR opened and merged: https://t.co/I3BjUjVA57

One step left now https://t.co/Otv8vX5Klk

1451178802101383173.text:
😬Looking for something a little more chilled? 🧊

😌We also have weekly Office Hours, a space for the whole community to come ask questions or chat.

🗓️Every Tuesday
🕒15:00 UTC

Zoom link 👇
https://t.co/TQKpwEJx0Q

1451178798758592514.text:
🥱Booring meetings?
🤷Never make any progress?

Our working meetings always have an agenda and results in assigned action items. Effeciant! 😎

📢Open Community Working Meeting📢
🗓️2021-11-05
🕗20:00 UTC

https://t.co/fqvzNoptrO

Got something to say? Raise it in the issue ☝️ https://t.co/CaLIc7U7yA

1450449976727846916.text:
😮In just under TWO HOURS, you get a chance to ask your questions about JSON Schema, get support, or just be part of our growing community.

🧐JSON Schema "Office Hours" is a space each week with no agenda. Just show up and ask!

😅Just, er, don't ask anything too difficult, OK? https://t.co/lSdXBUVFjC

1448590742088306694.text:
😮JSON Schema form generation vocabulary!?

🙏We're going to do our best to enable and support this effort, working with our community!

🥰It's great to see the community step up and take ownership over developing critically needed JSON Schema Vocabularies!

Our community 👉💪😊 https://t.co/kuqn4X9u0O

1448299212345589766.text:
😮Did you know, we're not an "IETF standard"?

💭We are considering self publishing new versions of JSON Schema as opposed to using IETF personal drafts.

😎This would also mean dropping the "draft" prefix from our release version identifier.

https://t.co/TBfc7wYgbQ

1447919214438850572.text:
It's that time again! 🥰

🤙JSON Schema Office Hours, 15:00 UTC

That time when you can get your JSON Schema problems solved... we hope 😅

Or just listen and learn, that's just fine too 🧑‍🎓

👉 https://t.co/TQKpwErW9i https://t.co/ecmUX9FqSX

1446018947606847490.text:
😩"JSON Schema is great, but I wish errors were easier to use!" - Is this you? We hear you.

🧑‍💻Want to help?

🧐We previously defined an "output" format. Now we are looking to improve it.

💬If validation results matter to you, NOW is the time to speak up
https://t.co/CXNe4JppXY

1445326346880704514.text:
🚀Last week we had our US-time-zone-friendly Open Community Working Meeting (2021-10-01)

🤔We discussed 3 agendered topics
✍️We generated 3 action items 🏋️
👉Find all the details and a recording: https://t.co/NTYcboCA6t

👀15 minute highlight? 👇
https://t.co/NpgVpXI2mi

1444948743338528772.text:
🤩We previously introduced our Code of Conduct, but now we also have a *Decision Record* as to why we did it the specific way that we did.

🧐If you're interested in such things, check it out: https://t.co/zT1amlMeNj

💭Knowing the HUMAN input into something has immense value!

1443922535494692866.text:
